item.description:
Last year one of my favorite events was a 5 mile hike in the Blue Hills followed by a mid-afternoon tour of the Sam Adams Brewery in Jamaica Plain (Boston). We will go to a local bar after the tour where we can get free Sam Adams glasses.

The hike will be steep at times so I recommend hiking shoes. We will go at a moderate pace but please make sure you can handle a 5 mile hike.

Final directions and update will come later. When you reply please let me know if you will attend both the hike and the Sam Adam Brewery Tour.
item.name: Blue Hills Hike and Sam Adams Tour
